meta.description: The Betaflight flight control system configuration tool

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 only

meta.long_description:
A crossplatform configuration tool for the Betaflight flight control system.
Various types of aircraft are supported by the tool and by Betaflight, e.g. 
quadcopters, hexacopters, octocopters and fixed-wing aircraft.
meta.name: betaflight-configurator
